meanings.definition: To anoint with oil or ointment.
meanings.sent1: She will noint the baby with soothing ointment.
meanings.sent2: The nurse will noint the patient's wound with healing oil.
meanings.sent3: The magician will noint his wand with magical oil before the show.
meanings.sent4: The chef will noint the dish with a drizzle of olive oil for extra flavor.
meanings.sent5: The gardener will noint the plant with essential oils to keep pests away.

meanings.definition: To apply oil or ointment to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: He will noint his dry skin with moisturizing lotion.
meanings.sent2: The athlete will noint his muscles with warming oil before the game.
meanings.sent3: The children will noint each other with sunscreen before going to the beach.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic will noint the rusty bolts with penetrating oil to loosen them.
meanings.sent5: The hiker will noint her blistered feet with soothing balm for relief.

meanings.definition: To consecrate or make sacred by applying oil.
meanings.sent1: The priest will noint the new church altar with holy oil.
meanings.sent2: The shaman will noint the sacred stones with blessed oil during the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The elder will noint the chosen leader with ceremonial oil for blessings.
meanings.sent4: The monk will noint the temple door with fragrant oil as a symbol of purity.
meanings.sent5: The healer will noint the sick person with sacred oils for spiritual healing.
